feed.title: BSides Jacksonville
feed.subtitle: BSides Jacksonville is an independent BSides event that is put on by dedicated volunteers in Jacksonville, Florida.

entry.title: Save The Date!
entry.content:
BSides JAX 2025 will be held on November 14th and 15th at the University of North Florida (UNF), University Center.

  • Training will be held on November 14th.
  • The conference will be held on November 15th.
entry.summary: BSides JAX 2025 will be held on November 14th and 15th at the University of North Florida (UNF), University Center.
